fullplot: Camille don't like the man her mother seen. She still dreaming about her father who's living in New York. One day, she saw her mother arguing with a woman prowling around her house for some time. She recognize in this woman her father who had change sex. Refusing his transformation, she will try to convince him to become her father, a man again.

title: Le sexe des ètoiles

tomatoes.consensus: Thanks to brilliant performances from Debra Winger and especially Anthony Hopkins, Shadowlands is a deeply moving portrait of British scholar C.S. Lewis's romance with American poet Joy Gresham.
